mapper.select: SELECT `C`.CMPLX_ID AS CMPLX_ID, `C`.CMPLX_NM AS CMPLX_NM, `C`.ADDR AS ADDR, `G_T`.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE AS CMPLX_GRP, `G_T`.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID AS CMPLX_GRP_ID FROM COMPLEX_M AS `C` LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_M_EXT AS `C_E` ON `C`.CMPLX_ID = `C_E`.CMPLX_ID LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_GRP_M AS `G` ON `C`.CMPLX_ID = `G`.CMPLX_ID LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_GRP_TYPE_M AS `G_T` ON `G`.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID = `G_T`.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID WHERE `C`.CMPLX_GB_CD = 'AD01102' -- IOK 전체 현장에서 COMMON Life 용도로 이용하기 위해서는 -- 'CMPLX_GB_CD' 값을 'AD01102'으로 설정해야 합니다 ORDER BY `G`.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID DESC, CMPLX_NM ASC ;

SELECT `C`.CMPLX_ID AS CMPLX_ID, `C`.CMPLX_CD AS CMPLX_CD, `C`.CMPLX_NM AS CMPLX_NM, -- COMPLEX NAME `C`.CMPLX_S_NM AS CMPLX_S_NM, `C`.LATI_POS AS LATI_POS, `C`.LONG_POS AS LONG_POS, `C`.UNIT_CNT AS UNIT_CNT, `C`.ADDR AS ADDR, -- 일반 주소 `C`.ADDR_DTL AS ADDR_DTL, `C`.ADDR1 AS ADDR1, `C`.ADDR2 AS ADDR2, `C_E`.CL_MAP_SRC AS CL_MAP_SRC, `C_E`.CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC AS CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC, `G_T`.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE AS CMPLX_GRP, IFNULL( `G_T`.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID, -1) AS CMPLX_GRP_ID FROM COMPLEX_M AS `C` LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_M_EXT AS `C_E` ON `C`.CMPLX_ID = `C_E`.CMPLX_ID LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_GRP_M AS `G` ON `C`.CMPLX_ID = `G`.CMPLX_ID LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_GRP_TYPE_M AS `G_T` ON `G_T`.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID = `G`.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID WHERE `C`.CMPLX_GB_CD = 'AD01102' -- IOK 전체 현장에서 COMMON Life 용도로 이용하기 위해서는 -- 'CMPLX_GB_CD' 값을 'AD01102'으로 설정해야 합니다 ;
SELECT CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID, CMPLX_GRP_TYPE, CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_DESC FROM COMPLEX_GRP_TYPE_M;
mapper.update: INSERT INTO `COMPLEX_GRP_M` ( CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID, CMPLX_ID ) VALUES ( ${cmplxGrpId}, ${cmplxId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID = ${cmplxGrpId}, UPD_DTTM=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
mapper.select: SELECT GRP_TYPE.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE AS CMPLX_GRP_TYPE, CMPLX.CMPLX_ID AS CMPLX_ID, CMPLX.CMPLX_CD AS CMPLX_CD, CMPLX.CMPLX_NM AS CMPLX_NM, -- COMPLEX NAME CMPLX.CMPLX_S_NM AS CMPLX_S_NM, CMPLX.LATI_POS AS LATI_POS, CMPLX.LONG_POS AS LONG_POS, CMPLX.UNIT_CNT AS UNIT_CNT, CMPLX.ADDR AS ADDR, -- 일반 주소 CMPLX.ADDR_DTL, CMPLX.ADDR1, CMPLX.ADDR2, CMPLX.LOC1_NM, CMPLX.LOC2_NM, CMPLX.POST_NO, CMPLX.IMG_SRC, CMPLX.MAP_SRC, CMPLX.LOGO_IMG_SRC, CMPLX.ADMIN_ID AS IOK_ADMIN_ID, CMPLX.REG_ID AS IOK_REG_ID, CMPLX.REG_DT AS IOK_REG_DT, CMPLX.CHG_ID AS IOK_CHG_ID, CMPLX.CHG_DT AS IOK_CHG_DT, CMPLX_EXT.CL_MAP_SRC AS CL_MAP_SRC, CMPLX_EXT.CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC AS CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC, CMPLX_EXT.FEED_WRITE_ALLOW_YN AS FEED_WRITE_ALLOW_YN, CMPLX_EXT.REG_DT AS REG_DT, (SELECT ADMIN_ID FROM CL_ADMIN_INFO WHERE ADMIN_IDX = CMPLX_EXT.REG_ADMIN_IDX) AS REG_ADMIN_ID, CMPLX_EXT.UPD_DT AS UPD_DT, (SELECT ADMIN_ID FROM CL_ADMIN_INFO WHERE ADMIN_IDX = CMPLX_EXT.UPD_ADMIN_IDX ) AS UPD_ADMIN_ID FROM (COMPLEX_M AS CMPLX LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_M_EXT AS CMPLX_EXT ON CMPLX.CMPLX_ID = CMPLX_EXT.CMPLX_ID) JOIN (COMPLEX_GRP_TYPE_M AS GRP_TYPE LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_GRP_M AS GRP ON GRP_TYPE.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID = GRP.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID) ON CMPLX.CMPLX_ID = GRP.CMPLX_ID WHERE CMPLX.CMPLX_GB_CD = 'AD01102' -- # CommonLife현장 == 'AD01102' AND CMPLX.CMPLX_ID = #{cmplxId} ;
